li.a: Eagles’ Nest Before and After School Care

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home current-menu-item page_item page-item-2 current_page_item menu-item-30

li.a: Eagles’ Nest Before and After School Care

a.title: View all projects filed under News & Announcements

Parents are an integral part of the Adams Traditional Academy family. Parents of students attending Adams Traditional Academy have the great opportunity of being directly involved in your child’s education. The partnership between parents and teachers makes our school a truly rewarding and positive environment for all. We looking forward to meeting and working with each new family as they come and join us at ATA. There are volunteer opportunities available to fit anyone's schedule ranging from school event committees to volunteering in your child's classroom.
Your support is vital, and we thank you for your participation!
View all projects filed under PTO
View all projects filed under Sports & Activities
Permanent Link to Eagles’ Nest 2020-2021 Registration is Now Open!

h2.a: Eagles’ Nest 2020-2021 Registration is Now Open!

a.title: Permanent Link to Eagles’ Nest 2020-2021 Registration is Now Open!

div.p: Eagles’ Nest offers before-school and after-school care for students in preschool through 8th grade. Students enjoy a wide variety of activities such as art, group games, science, team building activities, outdoor play, and time to complete homework.

a.title: Permanent Link to Sign up for 4th Quarter Clubs!
Permanent Link to Sign up for 4th Quarter Clubs!

div.p: Click on the link below for the list of extra-curricular programs offered for the 4th quarter of the 2019-20 school year.
All registrations will be conducted online at Choice Academies Pay Online.

a.title: Permanent Link to Spring Festival and Silent Auction!
Permanent Link to Spring Festival and Silent Auction!

div.p: Save the date, ATA Eagles! Our 10th Annual Spring Festival and Silent Auction is coming! Mark your calendars for this super fun event happening on Saturday, March 28th from 11 am – 2 pm. Come hungry and ready to have … Read More

a.title: Permanent Link to Third Quarter Staff Appreciation Luncheon
Permanent Link to Third Quarter Staff Appreciation Luncheon

div.p: The school’s 3rd quarter staff luncheon is scheduled for Tuesday, March 3rd, 2020. Please follow the link provided for more information, and for an opportunity to donate to the luncheon. We appreciate your time and efforts.
Click on the link below to read the February newsletter.
